name: opencode-orchestrator
description: 6-Agent collaborative architecture for OpenCode - Make any model reliable
author: agnusdei1207

scripts.build:rust:copy: docker compose run --rm dev sh -c 'cp /app/target/release/orchestrator /app/bin/' && chmod +x bin/orchestrator
scripts.build:ts: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target bun --format esm && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.build:scripts: mkdir -p dist/scripts && bun build scripts/postinstall.ts --outdir dist/scripts --target node
scripts.build: bun run build:ts && bun run build:scripts
scripts.build:full: bun run build:rust && bun run build:rust:copy && bun run build
scripts.release:patch: bun run build:full && bun run test && bun run version:patch && bun run publish:npm && bun run release:git
scripts.release:minor: bun run build:full && bun run test && bun run version:minor && bun run publish:npm && bun run release:git
scripts.release:major: bun run build:full && bun run test && bun run version:major && bun run publish:npm && bun run release:git
scripts.release:git: git add -A && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push && git push --tags
